name: POWrangers Games Week!
description:
Rules

You have 9 nights to work on your game.

All game-related programming is done after hours - lessons will still take place!

Work together as a team, this is not a competition! Have fun, share ideas, learn together.

Must be made using SimpleGFX ;) Deadline is February 19th, Sunday at 17:59h. Jar files are to be submitted to the jar_jar_bins channel.

Gameplay

Use keyboard input for movement (WASD or arrow keys) and mouse for interaction.

Made to announce the games week for my class. Tutorial shows the classroom and their teachers (who are interactable) and leads to a video compilation of previous projects on the interactable TV.

Choose Character is used to announce the teams.

Start is a final good luck message from the teachers to the students. Since it is the final step, there is no back button.
